items.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. fires two top deputies at HHS
items.description: Secretary Robert F. Kennedy has fired two top deputies at the Department of Health and Human Services.

items.title: Tropical storm to soak Gulf Coast as renewed flood threat hits Northeast and Midwest
items.description: A tropical threat on the Gulf Coast has a 40% chance for development into a tropical depression in the next 48 hours, according to the National Hurric...

items.title: 2 water buffaloes kill farmer after he becomes trapped in their enclosure
items.description: A farmer in Oklahoma has been killed by two water buffaloes after becoming trapped inside their enclosure, police said.

items.title: WATCH:  Hikers confront man accused of starting fire on Los Angeles trail
items.description: A group of hikers stepped in to help stop an alleged arsonist accused of starting a fire in LA's popular Runyon Canyon.

items.title: WATCH:  New Jersey delivery driver almost struck by lightning
items.description: A frightening moment was captured on camera as a delivery driver in Wayne, New Jersey, was almost struck by lightning on Monday as thunderstorms moved...
